name: Labware: Mutagens
description:
You know how to create mutagens which exploit the unpredictable and unscientific properties of Lapis Lazuli.
 
When used on someone other than yourself: Trigger [Injection Cooldown]. You can not inject that creature for 30 seconds.
 
- When used on some mob types, you can change them into a variant version of themselves.
 
- Upon use on a player, it rerolls every active [Side Effect] within the recipient and then breaks. If the player is a geneticist who is not under the effects of [Antimutagens], their [Innate Genes] will also be rerolled. If a player does not have any active [Side Effects], they will receive two random active [Side Effects]. If the recipient is sneaking, you will instead delete a single random [Side Effect] or generic [Gene]. There's a chance this secondary property will fail!
